text: Bagobiri in 2015 Joseph Danlami Bagobiri (8 November 1957 – 27 February 2018) was a Nigerian Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1983, Bagobiri served as bishop of Kafanchan from 1995 until his death in 2018. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Nigerian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joseph Bagobiri
